comments.body: Wrong layout. Goes `Proper Name <proper@email.xx> Commit Name <commit@email.xx>`, where commit name is `madphysicist`.

I am trying to get rid of the second line in the current output of `git log --format="%aN <%aE>" | sort -u`:

```
Joseph Fox-Rabinovitz <jfoxrabinovitz@gmail.com>
Joseph Fox-Rabinovitz <joseph.r.fox-rabinovitz@nasa.gov>
```

I did not notice that there was also this line:

```
Mad Physicist <madphysicist@users.noreply.github.com>
```
Fixed now. Sorry for making you deal with that.
